name: epiphytic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to a plant that grows on another plant but does not feed from it: epiphytic orchids The whisk ferns are epiphytic. See
epiphyte
More examplesFewer examplesEpiphytic cacti grow among the branches of larger trees.These plants live in nutrient-poor epiphytic habitats.Epiphytic orchids live on the branches of other plants, usually trees.
